languages.text: {n}Префект кашляет. А затем на ее лице появляется жуткая улыбка.{/n} "Я должна была хотя бы попытаться. Более сотни лет я верой и правдой служила протекторату фон Валанциус, скрупулезно наводя порядок там, где иные не справлялись. Пока вы и ваши предки вносили анархию и сумятицу в протекторат своими взбалмошными капризами и пустыми прихотями, я была той, кто пытался удержать владения от погружения в грех беспорядка. Благодаря мне эта гигантская система функционировала практически без сбоев — главными сбоями в ней были вы, Вольные Торговцы... Да. Я должна была хотя бы попытаться".

traits.locale_text: "Более сотни лет я верой и правдой служила Лекс Империалис, скрупулезно наводя порядок там, где иные не справлялись. И пока вы рассекали Простор, я была той, кто неусыпно охранял ваши владения от греха беззакония. Благодаря мне эта гигантская система функционировала практически без сбоев — и не было еще ситуации, с которой я бы не справилась. Неужели после всех этих лет ревностного служения я заслужила... такую благодарность?"
traits.speaker: VP_Prefect

languages.text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект кашляет. А затем на ее лице появляется жуткая улыбка.{/n} "Я должна была хотя бы попытаться. Более сотни лет я верой и правдой служила протекторату фон Валанциус, скрупулезно наводя порядок там, где иные не справлялись. Пока вы и ваши предки вносили анархию и сумятицу в протекторат своими взбалмошными капризами и пустыми прихотями, я была той, кто пытался удержать владения от погружения в грех беспорядка. Благодаря мне эта гигантская система функционировала практически без сбоев — главными сбоями в ней были вы, Вольные Торговцы... Да. Я должна была хотя бы попытаться".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough, then an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I had to at least try. I had served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc in the protectorate with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I had to at least try."

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin beginnt zu husten. Dann verzieht sie ihre Lippen zu einem enervierenden Lächeln.{/n} "Ich musste es wenigstens versuchen. Ich habe dem Protektorat derer von Valancius mehr als hundert Jahre lang treu gedient und akribisch für Ordnung gesorgt, wo andere versagt haben. Während Ihr und Eure Vorgänger mit Euren wechselnden Launen für Anarchie und Chaos gesorgt habt, war ich die Stütze, die dieses Reich davor bewahrte, in Kriminalität zu versinken. Ich war es, die dieses riesige System nahezu fehlerfrei am Laufen hielt ... der einzige Störfaktor wart Ihr, die Freihändler. Ja, ich musste es wenigstens versuchen."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin beginnt zu husten. Dann verzieht sie ihre Lippen zu einem enervierenden Lächeln.{/n} "Ich musste es wenigstens versuchen. Ich habe dem Protektorat derer von Valancius mehr als hundert Jahre lang treu gedient und akribisch für Ordnung gesorgt, wo andere versagt haben. Während Ihr und Eure Vorgänger mit Euren wechselnden Launen für Anarchie und Chaos gesorgt habt, war ich die Stütze, die dieses Reich davor bewahrte, in Kriminalität zu versinken. Ich war es, die dieses riesige System nahezu fehlerfrei am Laufen hielt ... der einzige Störfaktor wart Ihr, die Freihändler. Ja, ich musste es wenigstens versuchen."

languages.text: {n}La préfète tousse, puis un sourire perturbant se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Je devais au moins essayer. J'ai servi fidèlement le protectorat von Valancius pendant plus d'un siècle, en faisant tout mon possible pour cultiver l'ordre là où d'autres en avaient été incapables. Pendant que vos ancêtres et vous semiez l'anarchie en laissant libre cours à vos caprices, je suis devenue le seul pilier empêchant ce domaine de sombrer dans le crime et le désordre. C'est grâce à moi que ce système gargantuesque a continué de fonctionner presque parfaitement, perturbé uniquement par les libres-marchands comme vous. Voilà pourquoi je devais au moins essayer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète tousse, puis un sourire perturbant se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Je devais au moins essayer. J'ai servi fidèlement le protectorat von Valancius pendant plus d'un siècle, en faisant tout mon possible pour cultiver l'ordre là où d'autres en avaient été incapables. Pendant que vos ancêtres et vous semiez l'anarchie en laissant libre cours à vos caprices, je suis devenue le seul pilier empêchant ce domaine de sombrer dans le crime et le désordre. C'est grâce à moi que ce système gargantuesque a continué de fonctionner presque parfaitement, perturbé uniquement par les libres-marchands comme vous. Voilà pourquoi je devais au moins essayer. »

languages.text: {n}行政官咳嗽了一声，随后，她的唇角露出了令人不安的笑容。{/n}“至少，我总归要试试才行。我忠心耿耿地侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，长达一百多年。我煞费苦心，在混乱中建立秩序，而其他人都失败了。当你和你的祖先一次次心血来潮，没完没了地散播混乱与动荡的种子，我却始终坚守立场，成为了稳固的轴心，阻止王朝堕入犯罪、混乱之中。正是因为有了我，这个庞大的系统才能正常运转，几乎没有一丝瑕疵，而唯一的干扰就是你们，你们这些行商浪人。是啊，至少我总归要试试才行。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官咳嗽了一声，随后，她的唇角露出了令人不安的笑容。{/n}“至少，我总归要试试才行。我忠心耿耿地侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，长达一百多年。我煞费苦心，在混乱中建立秩序，而其他人都失败了。当你和你的祖先一次次心血来潮，没完没了地散播混乱与动荡的种子，我却始终坚守立场，成为了稳固的轴心，阻止王朝堕入犯罪、混乱之中。正是因为有了我，这个庞大的系统才能正常运转，几乎没有一丝瑕疵，而唯一的干扰就是你们，你们这些行商浪人。是啊，至少我总归要试试才行。”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta tose y te lanza una sonrisa perturbadora.{/n} «Tenía que intentarlo. Durante más de un siglo he servido fielmente al protectorado von Valancius, cultivando meticulosamente el orden donde nadie más lo hacía. Mientras usted y sus antepasados sembraban anarquía y desorden con sus incesantes caprichos, yo hacía de piedra angular para evitar que sus dominios se sumieran en la criminalidad. Es gracias a mí que este sistema tan colosal ha funcionado sin mayores incidencias, y la principal causa de estas incidencias eran precisamente los Comerciantes Independientes. Sí, tenía que intentarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta tose y te lanza una sonrisa perturbadora.{/n} «Tenía que intentarlo. Durante más de un siglo he servido fielmente al protectorado von Valancius, cultivando meticulosamente el orden donde nadie más lo hacía. Mientras usted y sus antepasados sembraban anarquía y desorden con sus incesantes caprichos, yo hacía de piedra angular para evitar que sus dominios se sumieran en la criminalidad. Es gracias a mí que este sistema tan colosal ha funcionado sin mayores incidencias, y la principal causa de estas incidencias eran precisamente los Comerciantes Independientes. Sí, tenía que intentarlo».

languages.text: {n}総監は咳払いする。そして、唇に不気味な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「せめて、やってみるだけのことはしたかった。私は百年以上にわたりフォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領に忠実に仕え、他の者が成し得なかった秩序を、辛抱強く築き上げてきた。君や君の先祖が、気まぐれにころころ変わる無秩序と大混乱の種をまいている間、私はこの領地が犯罪的な混乱に沈まないように支柱として立っていた。この巨大なシステムがほとんど欠陥なく機能し続けてきたのは、間違いなく私のおかげだ。唯一の混乱の種は、ローグトレーダー…君たちだ。だからこそ、私は少なくとも、やってみるしかなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は咳払いする。そして、唇に不気味な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「せめて、やってみるだけのことはしたかった。私は百年以上にわたりフォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領に忠実に仕え、他の者が成し得なかった秩序を、辛抱強く築き上げてきた。君や君の先祖が、気まぐれにころころ変わる無秩序と大混乱の種をまいている間、私はこの領地が犯罪的な混乱に沈まないように支柱として立っていた。この巨大なシステムがほとんど欠陥なく機能し続けてきたのは、間違いなく私のおかげだ。唯一の混乱の種は、ローグトレーダー…君たちだ。だからこそ、私は少なくとも、やってみるしかなかった」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt'in boğazından bir öksürük kopuyor. Ardından yüzüne sinir bozucu bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Denemek zorundaydım. Yüz yılı aşkın süredir von Valancius protektorasına yolumdan sapmadan, sadakatle hizmet ettim. Başkalarının sağlamayı beceremediği düzeni nakış işler misali ilmek ilmek inşa ettim. Siz ve soyunuz, maymun iştahınızla etrafa anarşi ve yıkım tohumları saçtınız. Bense dünyalarımızın suç bataklığına dönüşmesini engelleyen bir belkemiği görevi gördüm. Sayemde bu devasa sistem, olabildiğince hataya mahal vermeyecek şekilde işlemeye devam etti. Tek nifak kaynağı sizdiniz... Siz Hür Tacirler. Evet, denemek zorundaydım."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect lets out a cough. Then, an unnerving smile appears on her lips.{/n} "I at least had to try. I served the von Valancius protectorate faithfully for over a hundred years, painstakingly cultivating order where others had failed to do so. While you and your ancestors sowed anarchy and havoc with your ever-changing whims, I stood on as the linchpin that kept this domain from sinking into criminal disarray. It was because of me that this gargantuan system continued to function with barely a flaw — the only source of disruption was you, the Rogue Traders. Yes, I at least had to try."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt'in boğazından bir öksürük kopuyor. Ardından yüzüne sinir bozucu bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Denemek zorundaydım. Yüz yılı aşkın süredir von Valancius protektorasına yolumdan sapmadan, sadakatle hizmet ettim. Başkalarının sağlamayı beceremediği düzeni nakış işler gibi, ilmek ilmek inşa ettim. Siz ve soyunuz, maymun iştahınızla etrafa anarşi ve yıkım tohumları saçarken ben bu bölgenin suç bataklığına dönüşmesini engelleyen bir belkemiği görevi gördüm. Bu devasa sistem, olabildiğince hataya mahal vermeyecek şekilde benim sayemde işlemeye devam etti. Tek nifak kaynağı sizdiniz, siz Hür Tacirler. Evet, denemek zorundaydım."
